int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { downloader d1("http://127.0.0.1:8080/newtestfile.txt","outputfile.html"); d1.setup(); d1.startDownload(); return 0; } /*************************************************************************** * _ _ ____ _ * Project ___| | | | _ \| | * / __| | | | |_) | | * | (__| |_| | _ <| |___ * \___|\___/|_| \_\_____| * * Copyright (C) 1998 - 2018, Daniel Stenberg, , et al. * * This software is licensed as described in the file COPYING, which * you should have received as part of this distribution. The terms * are also available at https://curl.haxx.se/docs/copyright.html. * * You may opt to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute and/or sell * copies of the Software, and permit persons to whom the Software is * furnished to do so, under the terms of the COPYING file. * * This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY * KIND, either express or implied. * ***************************************************************************/ /* * Download a given URL into a local file named page.out. * */ #include #include #include #include #include #include class downloader{//probably thread safe if only one instance of downloader exists at a time otherwise all things will go to shit //returns 0 if good or 1 if bad public: CURL *curl_handle; std::string filepath,url; static double fileSize; int res; downloader(std::string url,std::string filepath):url(url),filepath(filepath),res(0){//need to include a pointer to the active menu as well } void setup(){ curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT); curl_handle = curl_easy_init(); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str()); //for now curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1L); //curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1L); } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); curl_easy_getinfo(curl_handle, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD, &fileSize); curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &downloader::write_data); res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle); std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; fclose(outFile); } return res; } static size_t write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream) { //gets called multiple times i think size_t written = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, (FILE *)stream); std::cout << "wrote: "<< written << std::endl; std::cout << "filesize: " << fileSize << std::endl; return written; } ~downloader(){ curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle); curl_global_cleanup(); } }; double downloader::fileSize = 0; } int startDownload(){ FILE *outFile; outFile = fopen(filepath.c_str(), "wb"); if(outFile) { curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, outFile); //actually start download res = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle);
